body_html:
I can download it directly and I tried on the machine. It was able to download it. I remember the error message from bazel specifically mentioned not having two working mirrors and that it wasn't able to continue. It seemed weird at the time.

Since I was able to work around it by adding a new mirror I'll see if I can repro tomorrow to get the exact error message that bazel produced.

body:
I can download it directly and I tried on the machine. It was able to download it. I remember the error message from bazel specifically mentioned not having two working mirrors and that it wasn't able to continue. It seemed weird at the time.

Since I was able to work around it by adding a new mirror I'll see if I can repro tomorrow to get the exact error message that bazel produced.
